dc_title_s: Title: A map of Hindoostan, or the Mogul Empire: (Sheet 4)
dct_alternativeTitle_sm: Title: A map of Hindoostan\, or the Mogul Empire : (Sheet 4)
dc_description_s: from the latest authorities. Inscribed to Sir Joseph Banks Bart., President of the Royal Society & c., & c. by his much obliged & faithful friend and servant; Scale approximately 1:3,000,000 (E 65⁰--E 100⁰/N 33⁰--N 6⁰). Relief shown pictorially. "The map engraved by I. Phillips & W. Harrison - The writing by T. Harmar." Prime meridian: [London]. "Sold by W. Faden Geographer to his Majesty and to His Royal Highness the Prince of Wales, No. 5, Charing Cross." 1 map : hand color ; 104 x 121 cm
b1g_keyword_sm: Mogul Empire Maps Early Works to 1800
